titles.title: A bill to recognize the organization known as the National Academies of Practice, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S573-574)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Grants a Federal charter to the National Academies of Practice, honoring persons of the health care professions.
